summary: A stand-alone addition to Glas\' China Doll Race.
descriptionHtml:
Steam: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=156991810]Doll Race Books v1.0.0.0[/url]

To be used with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34514]Glas\' China Doll Race and/or Cerami Companion[/url], but it can be used by itself.

It contains six books of doll lore, including their creator. The sixth book is reserved for when I get lots of information on Cerami.[center]-------------------------------------[/center]It\'s probably best if you put these above the Cerami companion or any other Glas doll race companions, should she make more, so that if any of them make a query to find these books and pop them in the companion inventory, it\'ll be easier to find them.[center]-------------------------------------[/center]version-line
? alpha
[i]0.1.0.0[/i]: Initial release, yay~!

[i]0.1.0.1[/i]: Added the missing words (I dunno how I missed themâ€¦), corrected a grammatical mistake in the first book.

? beta
[i]0.1.1.0[/i]: The sixth book has Cerami\'s information.

completed releases
[i]1.0.0.0[/i]: Enemies should drop Anameri\'s Dolls books, Merchants should sell them. Let me know if they don\'t, ever, do so [i][b]and[/b][/i] you\'re sure another mod isn\'t using the same loot lists.[center]-------------------------------------[/center]Book Hex (XX is the load order hex for this mod):
XX0012d0 : Anameri\'s Dolls - Vol. 1
XX0012d1 : Anameri\'s Dolls - Vol. 2
XX0012d2 : Anameri\'s Dolls - Vol. 3
XX0012d3 : Anameri\'s Dolls - Vol. 4
XX0012d4 : Anameri\'s Dolls - Vol. 5
XX0012d5 : Anameri\'s Dolls - Vol. 6

Console command: player.additem [item (hex)] [quantity (whole number)]

NMM and Mod Organizer both list the load order.[center]-------------------------------------[/center]Special thanks to:
Glas for making the china doll race.
Glas for letting me write the lore for them.
Rex1029 for making the mod I experimented with while learning to make items.
mcarofano(?) for making the master file that taught me how to make books specifically.
author: Anahuyu

files.name: Doll Race Books
files.fileName: Lore Books by Anahuyu for China Doll Race by Glas-37761-1-alpha.zip
